data.title: 2019 Australia & New Zealand Tour
data.meta_site_name: Campion Rugby | 2019 Australia & New Zealand Tour
data.text:
Touring party

MASTERS

#99: Rod Charlton (1st XV Coach)

Interests: include all sports Ambition: To become a sports psychologist and to take a Campion Rugby tour to South Africa.

#100: Keith P Williams (Head of Sixth Form)

Interests: Sports, Irish music, good food and good beer.

Ambition: To return to Manchester having converted the South, and to enjoy teaching for as long as possible.

tour captain

#108: Philip Friel (Capt, Scrum Half)

18 years old | 5’8” | 11st.

Studying: BTEC - following on to upper primary education with P.E. as main subject at Trinity and All Saints, Leeds.

Representative Rugby: 1st XV. London Schools, Essex and Eastern Counties

Interests: A lot of sports, rugby, cricket, badminton, football, basketball, swimming. Cross Country, athletics for Essex. I enjoy cinema, videos, art and socialising

Ambition: To play for England.

TOURING SQUAD

#101: Luke Anthony (Wing Forward)

17 years old |5' 11” | st 5lbs

Studying: 'A' levels - Biology, Chemistry & Geography

Interests: All sports particularly football & cricket

Ambition: To study P.E. at university & to continue to enjoy all sports

#102: Alistair Bailey (Lock Forward)

17 years old | 6' 6” | 15st 9lbs

Studying: ‘A' levels - Music, French & Geography

Interests: Music, athletics, basketball, rugby, most sports, socialising & enjoying myself

Ambition: To win National Shot Putt finals in the summer, to study French with Music at University

#103: Daniel Barrett (Centre)

16 years old | 5' 8” | 11st 11lbs

Studying: G.C.S.E's - I hope to continue into the 6th form

Interests: Playing Golf, playing & watching other sports, listening to music

Ambition: To carry on playing & enjoying sport, at a high level

#104: David Brooks (Full Back)

18 years old | 5' 8” | 11st

Studying: 'A’ levels - English, Geography & General Studies

Interests: All sports, listening to music & socialising.

Ambition: To travel the world, earn lots of money & be happy

#105: Matthew Chapman (Scrum Half/Fly Half)

17 years old | 5’ 9” | 10st 5lbs

Studying: ‘A' levels - Biology, History & English.

Interests: All sports especially Rugby. Singing in the Barber Shop & socialising

Ambition: To study Law at Cambridge University, to own a firm of solicitors & to reach 6 foot

#106: Matthew Cooper (Scrum Half/Wing)

17 years old | 5' 6” | 10st

Studying: ‘A’ levels - English language, literature & Business Statistics.

Interests: Play rugby for Upminster RFC, play the electric guitar, & enjoy most music

Ambition: To follow a career in finance

#107: Anthony Diprose (No. 8)

18 years old | 6’ 5” | 16st

Representative Rugby: 1st XV (89-91), Essex U15/U16/U18, Eastern Counties U16/U18, London U16/U19, England U18 v Australia.

Studying: 'A’ levels - Maths, History, Economics & General studies

Interests: basketball & socialising

Ambition: To go on to Higher Education & take a Degree in sports studies, & recreation management in order to pursue a career in the leisure industry

#109: Paul Furzer (Outside Half/Fly Half)

18 years old | 5' 11” | 11st

Representative rugby: Essex & Eastern counties U18.

Studying: 'A’ Levels - Maths, English, French & General studies

Interests: All sports especially rugby

Ambition: Travel to America, Australia

#110: Adrian Gallagher (Second Row/Lock)

18 years old | 6’ 2” | 15st

Studying: 'A' levels - Biology, Maths, Economics & General Studies

Interests: Reading. all sports, socialising. keeping fit & weight lifting

Ambition: To go to university to study Biology & to follow a career in immunology & genetics

#111: Rhurie Gilmour (Back Row/Wing Forward)

17 years old | 6' 0” | 12st

Studying: BTEC in Business & Finance

Interests: Rugby, swimming, tennis, squash & golf

Ambition: Work for a few years to earn some money to enable me to travel before joining the Police Force at 22

#112: Stuart Hadaway (Second Row)

18 years old | 6' 3” | 19st.

Studying: BTEC National

Interests: Most sports, socialising. playing for Brentwood Rugby Club (colts)

Ambition: To join the Police Force

#113: Stephen Hoare (Open Flanker)

18 years old | 6' 0" | 13st

Representative rugby: Essex U15/U18, 1st XV, Sevens team

Studying: BTEC in Business & Finance

Interests: Music, food, sport, cross-country, Havering

Ambition: To work & play in New Zeal&

#114: James Holmes (Wing)

17 years old | 6’ 3” | 12st 13lbs

Studying: BTEC National

Interests: Music, sport

Ambition: To get a job in a finance house or bank

#115: Luke Jarvis (Fly Half/Centre)

17 years old | 6’ 0” | 10st 7lbs

Studying: ‘A' level - Latin, History & English

Interests: Rugby, Cricket & most sports

Ambition: To study law at University, to become successful & do well in life

#116: LEE McClellan (Full Back)

17 years old | 5’8” | 9st 5lbs

Studying: ‘A' levels - English, History & Latin.

Interests: Rugby, golf, badminton & most sports, music & watching comedies.

Ambition: To become a lawyer, grow, & enjoy myself

#117: RICHARD McComish (Wing)

18 years old | 6’ 0” | 11st

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Mathematics, History & Geography

Interests: Skiing, windsurfing & outdoor pursuits.

Ambition: Hope to enter higher education after a year off, to enjoy & lead life to the full.

#118: Craig Morgan (Scrum Half/Fly Half)

17 years old | 5’ 8” | 10st

Studying: 'A' levels - Biology. History & English Literature

Interests: Sports, plays rugby for Upminster RFC

Ambition: To go into law or journalism

#119: Tom Murray (Prop)

18 years old | 5’ 10" | 14st

Representative Rugby: Campion 1st. XV (1989-91), Essex U18 (1989-91)

Studying: 'A' levels - Ancient History, Greek & Latin

Ambition: To study Classics at University & then possibly pursue a career in law or business. (If I get through the tour)

Interests: Most sports, especially skiing, all kinds of music & I enjoy playing the guitar

#120: David Newman (Back Row)

18 years old | 5' 10” | 11st

Studying: ‘A’ Levels - Biology, Geography & General studies

Interests: All sports especially cycling

Ambitions: To do well in life, but most of all to be happy in whatever I choose to do

#121: Michael Newman (Prop)

17 years old | 6' 0” | 13st

Studying: BTEC in finance

Interests: Playing rugby. Played for Upminster RFC U15-U17. Fishing, music & socialising.

Ambition: To go into the financial world of the city, & be happy in the future

#122: Matthew Norton (Wing)

18 years old | 6’ 0” | 11st 3Ibs

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Maths, Chemistry, Economics & General Studies

Interests: Rugby, football, snow & water skiing & most other sports

Ambition: Own a Ferrari

#123: Paul Nye (Wing)

18 years old | 5' 11” | 12st 4lbs

Representative: Rugby schools & member of National Seven's winning side

Studying: ‘A' levels - Biology, Maths, Economics & General

Interests: Life & works of Peter Greenaway (film director)

Ambition: To go to Aberdeen University to study anatomical science & enter the field of osteopathy

#087: Ugene O'Herlihy (Centre)

18 years old | 5' 8” | 12st 2lbs

Representative Rugby: Essex U15/U16/U18, Eastern Counties U16/U18, London & South East U16/U18, England U16/U18

Studying: ‘A' levels

Interests: Skiing, general outdoor activities, music (good music that is) reading, cinema & socialising

Ambition: To study European business & French at University & then pursue a career in business after spending some time travelling around the world

#088: Darren O'Leary (Centre)

18 years old | 6' 0" | 13st

Representative Rugby: 1st. XV (Capt), London Irish U19, Essex U15/U16/U18, Eastern Counties U16/U18, London U18, South of England U18, England U18 squad

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Maths, English, Economics & General Studies

Interests: Music, most sports & socialising

Ambition: To study Business & Sport Studies at Swansea University

#124: Paul Reid (Flanker)

18 years old | 6' 2” | 12st 6lbs

Studying: A' levels - Biology, Economics, Maths & General Studies

Interests: All sports especially rugby, volleyball & water skiing

Ambition: To be happy & healthy & rich, famous...oh, & to travel the world &. . .&

#125: David Ryan (Winger)

18 years old | 5' 7" | 10st 7lbs.

Representative rugby: Essex U15

Studying: ‘A’ levels - English, History, French & General Studies

Interests: Travelling, socialising, music, tennis, sport. School Head Boy 1990-91

Ambition: Go to University - study Sociology & Politics become a teacher, see the world

#126: Matthew Slater (Second Row)

18 years old | 6' 3" |13st

Representative Rugby: Campion 1st XV (1989-91), Essex U18

Studying: 'A' levels - Maths, Latin & History

Interests: Basketball, cricket for school, local history, trigonometry.

Ambition: Blue Peter presenter.

#127: John Solosy (Second Row)

17 years old | 6' 3" | 13st 7lbs

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Economics, Statistics, History, & G.C.S.E. Media studies

Interests: Socialising, playing badminton, swimming & most other sports, music & playing musical instruments.

Ambitions: University to further my studies & continue rugby at a high level. I would like a career in something outdoors

#092: Daniel Smith (Backs/Wing Forward)

18 years old | 5’ 10” | 13st

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Maths, Physics & Economics

Interests: Rugby, Music.

Ambition: To be a Honey Dew melon!- but secretly to go to University & follow a career in electronic engineering

#128: Darren Szukalski (Prop)

17 years old | 6’ 0” | 14st 9lbs

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Business studies, statistics & Geography

Interests: Sports especially golf & squash. I also listen to a lot of music

Ambition: Hope to go to University to study a business-related degree, to travel & to get a good job.

#129: Peter Tiernan (Wing Forward)

16 years old | 5’ 11” | 12st 2lbs

Studying: G.C.S.E.

Interests: All sports, most music & socialising

Ambition: To do sport for as long as possible.

#130: Damian Tolan (Wing)

17 years old | 5' 10” | 9st

Studying: ‘A’ levels - Biology, Chemistry & Physics

Interests: Music, including playing piano & singing in the school Barbershop. I also like running & athletics

Ambition: To become a medical student & have a good time

#131: James Townsend (Hooker/Wing Forward)

18 years old | 5' 8" | 10st 8lbs

Studying: BTEC in Business & Finance.

Interests: Most sports, especially rugby & swimming

Ambition: To be successful, rich & have a good time

#132: Stephen Wadsworth (No. 8)

17 years old | 6' 2” | 12st 7lbs

Studying: 'A' levels - Biology, Chemistry & History

Interests: Play rugby for Brentwood RFC U17, enjoy all sports especially cricket & swimming. music & singing in the school Barbershop

Ambition: To study Law at University, travel the world & enjoy life

#133: William Wallis (Prop)

18 years old | 5’ 11" | 18st

Studying: BTEC in Business & Finance

Interests: Most sports including rugby, windsurfing, squash, snooker & fishing

Ambition: To be successful & happy in whatever I do
